entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
